content: --- title: Ground Handling Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-09-17T07:38:25.175Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:40:29.716Z --- # Turnaround Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :-------------------------- | :----------: | :------------------------------------------------ | | turnaroundId | `'string'` | Turnaround identifier | | turnaroundEventType | `'string'` | Turnaround event type e.g. Fuel, Pax Bridge | | turnaroundEventSubtype | `'string'` | Turnaround event subtype e.g. FirstCateringTruckCompletesAscent| | operationalDefinition | `'string'` | Operational definition of turnaround event. e.g. Fuel track on position | | inBoundFlightId | `'string'` | Inbound flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | inBoundUdor | `'date'` | Inbound flight date of origination in UTC | | inBoundUdorLocal | `'date'` | Inbound flight date of origination in local timezone | | inBoundCarrier | `'string'` | Inbound flight carrier code, TK, XQ etc | | inBoundFlightNumber | `'string'` | Inbound flight number | | outBoundFlightId | `'string'` | Outbound flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons. | | outBoundUdor | `'date'` | Outbound flight date of origination in UTC | | outBoundUdorLocal | `'date'` | Outbound flight date of origination in local timezone | | outBoundCarrier | `'string'` | Outbound flight carrier code, TK, XQ etc | | outBoundFlightNumber | `'string'` | Outbound flight number | | regId | `'string'` | Registration number of aircraft | | scheduledDate | `'datetime'` | Scheduled date and time of the turnaround event in UTC | | actualDate | `'datetime'` | Actual date and time of the turnaround event in UTC | | station | `'string'` | Station IATA code | | ramp | `'string'` | Ramp of the station | | rampStatus | `'string'` | Status of the ramp | | groundHandler | `'string'` | Code of the ground services handler | | extraInfo | `'string'` |
fm:title: Ground Handling Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-09-17T07:38:25.175Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:40:29.716Z
